0.description: Invotim is a web-based project and client management system implemented using CodeIgniter framework. It uses JQuery and MYSQL database.The system will give you the opportunity to calculate the time spent on a particular project and create custom invoices and send them to your clients directly,it will also help you in managing and tracking your income by the detailed reports it produces.
0.name: Invotim Project Management System

1.description: Soulmate is an online wedding portal for finding your perfect match. Built on PHP with the powerful framework Laravel. This is a user friendly and responsive portal which gives a complete treat for all the match seekers.This online script provides assistance for you to find a perfect match, this wedding portal will filter out your soulmate from the thousands of other matches. You can find all information about your perfect partner, even the minute details such as their religion, caste, star signs, moon signs, their interest’s hobbies and everything you should know about your perfect soulmate.The script consists of a powerful admin panel which makes the script unique and special
1.name: Soulmate – Matrimonial Portal

2.description: Advanced Email Scraper (AES) – SAAS is most powerful web based tool to extract emails by various techniques like website crawl, URL crawl, search in Google/Bing, search in txt/json/xml/doc/docx/pdf file. This script can also check email validation (pattern, MX record) , search for whois data, filter your email list by removing duplicate emails, decode modified email string, check web page status .
2.name: Advance email scraper -SAAS

3.description: Gym management system is an easy-to-use gym and health club membership management system. It helps you keep records of your members and their memberships, and allows easy communication between you and your members. Gym Management system is also feature-packed, helping you in the management and growth of your club.
3.name: GYM / FITNESS CLUB MANAGEMENT AND ADMINISTRATION

4.description: zFiles v1.0.5 is Advanced PHP Multiple File Uploader allows your visitors and your users to upload multiple files at a time. Also can share Files with other users or create a public link for anyone. zFiles was created for everyone that must constantly send or receive files. Created with HMVC PHP(laravel) and the amazing Twitter Bootstrap, easy to modify and to understand
4.name: zFiles - Online file Sharing Platform

-KHHLtDzgsrh1W-YpKhL.description: phpSFP – is a Platform where you can easily manage your scheduling for all your pages & groups in one place. It helps to send messages, ads, events, news and so on. -KHHQPdh2CJtUdOnTtWt.description: SPRUCE SALES & CRM is a fully functional CRM & Sales System. Empower your sales department with a complete CRM & Sales solution that they can use to boost sales dramatically. SPRUCE SALES & CRM helps you record leads, opportunities, add new customers, register sales and create invoices. The whole sales process simplified in a simple modern light-weight system that will change how you do business. -KHLkKX6DcloW08XFBtR.description: Transporter Script provide you ability to manage your fleets booking business online, After installation you have to add location for which you are providing services then upload fleets you are providing for services and then finally add fares for two location for each fleet and that’s it.
